Job Title: Business Analyst




About the Role: Business Analyst with Coupa




Experience: 7-13 Years

Locations: Open to Bangalore, Pune, and Mumbai, with Bangalore as the top preference.

Notice Period: Immediate to 45 Days




Job Description:




We are looking for an experienced and results-driven Business Analyst to join our team. The ideal candidate will bring exceptional analytical skills, experience with Coupa implementation, and a deep understanding of the banking domain.




Key Responsibilities:

• Collaborate with stakeholders to gather, analyze, and document business requirements (BRD) and functional requirements (FRD).

• Lead and support the implementation of Coupa solutions, ensuring alignment with business objectives.

• Act as the primary liaison between business stakeholders and technical teams, ensuring clear communication and understanding.

• Analyze and document workflows, processes, and system dependencies in the banking environment.

• Facilitate workshops and meetings to drive alignment on requirements, priorities, and deliverables.

• Perform gap analysis and recommend effective solutions to meet business needs.

• Support testing activities, including creating test plans, executing test cases, and facilitating user acceptance testing (UAT).

• Monitor project progress, identify risks, and propose mitigation strategies to ensure successful project delivery.




Qualifications:

• Proven experience as a Business Analyst with strong expertise in creating BRD and FRD documents.

• Hands-on experience with Coupa implementation or similar procurement systems.

• Solid understanding of banking processes, regulations, and workflows.

• Exceptional communication and stakeholder management skills.

• Strong problem-solving abilities with a focus on delivering practical solutions.

• Proficiency in business analysis tools and methodologies.

• Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Finance, Information Systems, or a related field (preferred).




Preferred Skills:

• Experience in Agile methodologies and working in cross-functional teams.

• Knowledge of procurement and expense management systems in the banking sector.
